page.shortlink: api objects response object set header method
page.description: Sets an HTTP header to the current response.
page.prototype: Context.Response.SetHeader as V (Name as C, Value as C)

argument.name: Name
argument.description: The name of the HTTP header item.

argument.name: Value
argument.description: The value of the HTTP header item.

page.discussion: Context.Response.SetHeader(Name, Value) set an HTTP header to the current response. If the header already exists, it's value is overwritten with the Value passed in. If the header does not already exist, it is added.
